PHRASE.LANG: Always wanted a skull for a companion? Now you can! Watch it do cool tricks and motions! This Mayan is available in silver and gold! [#Legal]

Vous avez toujours rêvé d'avoir un crâne pour compagnon ? C'est désormais possible ! Observez-le bouger et réaliser des tours amusants ! Ce crâne maya est disponible en version argent et or ! [#Legal]

Du wolltest schon immer einen Schädel als Begleiter haben? Jetzt kannst du es! Schau zu und bewundere, was für coole Tricks und Bewegungen er beherrscht. Dieser Maya ist in Silber und in Gold verfügbar. [#Legal]
Hai sempre voluto un teschio da compagnia? Ora ce l'hai! Guardalo mentre si muove ed esegue qualche trucchetto! Disponibile in oro e argento! [#Legal]
¿Siempre quisiste una calavera? ¡Ya puedes tener una! ¡Mira cómo se mueve y hace impresionantes trucos! ¡Este maya está disponible en plata y en oro! [#Legal]
Always wanted a skull for a companion? Now you can! Watch it do cool tricks and motions![#Legal]
혹시 애완동물로 해골을 가지고 싶었던 적 있으세요? 이제는 가능합니다! 해골이 멋진 동작으로 재롱을 부리는 것을 보세요! [#Legal]
Always wanted a skull for a companion? Now you can! Watch it do cool tricks and motions! [#Legal]
一直想有個骷髏頭的夥伴嗎？現在可以了！它還懂得做很棒的花招和動作！[#Legal]
一直想有個骷髏頭的夥伴嗎？現在可以了！它還懂得做很棒的花招和動作！[#Legal]
Always wanted a skull for a companion? Now you can! Watch it do cool tricks and motions! This Mayan is available in silver and gold! [#Legal]
